mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, ROLE_ID, USERNAME, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, NAME, MOBILE, EMAIL, CCCD, PASSWORD_HASH, REGISTERED_AT FROM ROLE WHERE USERNAME = #{USERNAME} AND ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE';
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM USER WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE');
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM USER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND ACTIVE = 'ACTIVE');
